stack:
AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09
Transform: AWS::Serverless-2016-10-31
Resources:
  DeployPocUI:
    Type: AWS::Serverless::Function
    Properties:
      FunctionName: !Sub ${AWS::StackName}-DeployPocUI
      Description: !Sub
        - Stack ${StackTagName} Environment ${EnvironmentTagName} Function ${ResourceName}
        - ResourceName: DeployPocUI
      CodeUri: ./
      Handler: index.handler
      Runtime: nodejs12.x
      MemorySize: 3008
      Timeout: 30
      Tracing: Active
      Policies:
        - AWSXrayWriteOnlyAccess
        - S3CrudPolicy:
            BucketName: !Ref PocUI
      Environment:
        Variables:
          BUCKET_NAME: !Ref PocUI
          BUCKET_ARN: !GetAtt PocUI.Arn
  PocUI:
    Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
    Properties:
      BucketName: !Sub ${AWS::StackName}-pocui-${AWS::AccountId}
      WebsiteConfiguration:
        IndexDocument: index.html
  DeployPocUIDeployTrigger:
    Type: Custom::FunctionDeployTrigger
    Properties:
      ServiceToken: !GetAtt DeployPocUI.Arn
      DeploymentTimestamp: !Ref DeploymentTimestamp
Parameters:
  StackTagName:
    Type: String
    Description: Stack Name (injected by Stackery at deployment time)
  EnvironmentTagName:
    Type: String
    Description: Environment Name (injected by Stackery at deployment time)
  DeploymentTimestamp:
    Type: Number
    Description: Deployment preparation timestamp in milliseconds Since Epoch (injected by Stackery at deployment time)
